t: We share your passion for cycling | HAIBIKE
s: Choose your country and language · Countries with a basket have online shopping · Europe · België · FrançaisEnglish · Česko · CzechEnglish · Deutschland · DeutschEnglish · España

July 27, 2021 - Hi Bike LTD was founded in 1994, We created the riders-oriented MTB frames and components even related products. Because of the rich experiences for bikes, we are also the brand owner of Da Bomb, Relic, TitanTech.

We are HIBIKE, a bicycle shop. Since 1994, we are passionate about cycling. You will find all the top level premium brands, no matter if it is bicycles, accessories, bike parts or cycling apparel in our shop. (Most of) the goods can be purchased online.
Explore a wide range of our Hibike selection. Find top brands, exclusive offers, and unbeatable prices on eBay. Shop now for fast shipping and easy returns!
